invitation.subject: You've been invited to access {accountName}'s account
invitation.invitedBy: {ownerName} has invited you to access {accountName}'s account.
invitation.clickButton: Click the button below to accept the invitation. You'll receive your login credentials in a separate email after verification.
invitation.linkExpires: This invitation link will expire in 48 hours for security purposes.
invitation.ignoreIfUnexpected: If you didn't expect this invitation, you can safely ignore this email.

credentials.subject: Your login credentials for {accountName}
credentials.credentialsIntro: Please find below your login credentials for accessing {accountName}'s account.

verification.subject: Welcome - Verify your email
verification.welcome: Welcome! Thank you for signing up.
verification.clickButton: Click the button below to verify your email address and activate your account.
verification.linkExpires: This verification link will expire in 24 hours for security purposes.
verification.ignoreIfUnexpected: If you didn't create an account, you can safely ignore this email.

passwordReset.subject: Reset your password
passwordReset.requestReceived: We received a request to reset your password.
passwordReset.clickButton: Click the button below to create a new password.
passwordReset.linkExpires: This password reset link will expire in 1 hour for security purposes.
passwordReset.ignoreIfUnexpected: If you didn't request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email. Your password will remain unchanged.
